tag.description: LeafLet component is built on LeafLet API. LeafLet is highly integrated with JSF development model and enhanced with Ajax capabilities.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: An com.edernilson.componentes.model.leaflet.MapModel instance.
attribute.name: model

attribute.description: Inline style of the map container.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the map container.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Type of the map. Required.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Center point of the map. Required.
attribute.name: center

attribute.description: Defines the initial zoom level. Default is 8.
attribute.name: zoom

attribute.description: Controls street view support. Default is false.
attribute.name: streetView

attribute.description: Disables default UI controls. Default is false.
attribute.name: disableDefaultUI

attribute.description: Defines visibility of navigation control. Default is true.
attribute.name: navigationControl

attribute.description: Defines visibility of map type control. Default is true.
attribute.name: mapTypeControl

attribute.description: Defines draggability of map. Default is true.
attribute.name: draggable

attribute.description: Disables zooming on mouse double click. Default is false.
attribute.name: disableDoubleClickZoom

attribute.description: Javascript callback to execute when a point on map is clicked.
attribute.name: onPointClick

attribute.description: Defines setting center and zoom values auto by included overlays on startup. Default value is false
attribute.name: fitBounds

tag.description: LeafLetInfoWindow is used with LeafLet component to open a window on map when an overlay is selected.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Maximum width of the info window. Default is min integer value.
attribute.name: maxWidth
